attributes.action: Call a General Election when Tony Blair resigns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the constitution so that when the current Prime Minister resigns his post that Parliment is suspended and a General Election is called. This will prevent Gordon Brown succession and  becoming the next Prime Minister without recourse to the vote of the electorate of this great Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
